text: The following is a list of rock studio albums by notable artists that have been described as such by music reviews or any similar source. They are listed in chronological order. ==2000s== Year Artist Album 2005 Secondhand Serenade Awake 2007 Maritime Heresy and the Hotel Choir 2008 Secondhand Serenade A Twist in My Story ==2010s== Year Artist Album 2010 Secondhand Serenade Hear Me Now 2011 Maritime Human Hearts 2014 Secondhand Serenade Undefeated 2015 Maritime Magnetic Bodies/Maps of Bones ==References== Category:Rock albums
title: List of rock albums
